name: Time Rancher
description:
Welcome to the TIME RANCH !

Manage a herd of timelings, little hourglass-shaped creatures that are too stupid to survive on their own !

Controls

Click your mouse to hit the ground with the time hammer and flip nearby timelings before their sand runs out.

Made under 72 hours for LameJam 27

Theme : Playing with time

Credits

Art & Game Design : Robin Deriaud & Victor Lopez

Programming : Robin Deriaud

Sound : Victor Lopez

Music : Amir Chefner

Lil’ tips from the time keeper

  • The larger a timeling is, the fastest the sand in it flows. Simple physics !
  • Flipping a timeling on its head prevents it from moving !
  • A timeling will drop time dust whenever it lands on its feet. Flip ’em often if you want to maximize your productivity !
  • Use strategic hammer whacks to herd timelings where you want them to go ! They will walk away from the impact if they land on their feet.
